title: Janssen, Johnson & Johnson
subTitle: Ideas & Implementation
body: This is a personal website of the founder of Brahmware, Sanchayan Bhunia. This service is not availble for public.
quote: With the branding and advertising services offered by Brahmware, we at Janssen, Johnson & Johnson are quite pleased. Their team of specialists assisted us in creating a solid and unified brand image that properly reflects our expertise in pharmaceutical testing and manufacture. Their clever marketing initiatives have made us more visible and accessible to a larger audience. We heartily endorse their services to any business trying to improve its branding and advertising initiatives.
name: Sanchayan Bhunia

title: Hexa India
subTitle: Ideas & Implementation
body: This is a personal website of the founder of Brahmware, Sanchayan Bhunia. This service is not availble for public.
quote: We manufacture kitchen appliances and home fixtures, and we have enjoyed working with Brahmware over the past few months. Their knowledge of business, technology, branding, and advertising services has been really helpful to us as we grow our firm. Their crew is very knowledgeable, quick to respond, and committed to comprehending our particular needs as a company. They offered us a wide range of services that have enhanced our internal operations, technological foundation, and brand reputation. We now have a brand that accurately represents us, and Brahmware's work has made it easier for us to draw in and keep customers. Additionally, our production and efficiency have increased. We heartily advise every company to use Brahmware.

title: Indian Media Syndicate
subTitle: Ideas & Concept
body: Indian Media Syndicate endeavors to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world generating scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.
quote: We have been collaborating with Brahmware for more than a year and are quite happy with their services. We have improved our overall financial performance and identified new revenue streams thanks to their business consulting. Their technological know-how has been crucial in enhancing the dependability and scalability of our OTT platform, enabling us to support a user base that is continually expanding. Additionally, their branding and advertising solutions have assisted us in building a solid and identifiable brand in the cutthroat media sector. Any OTT platform or media network aiming to improve their operations and expand should strongly consider Brahmware.
name: Dipro Mandal
designation: Head of Broadcast at Indian Media Syndicate
